name: Stir The Pot - TTC Series 01 Tweetcart 02
description:
The second tweetcart for the Tweetcart Token Club (TTC)!
A generative art piece in a single tweet worth of code.
Refresh the page to generate a new piece. Click/Tap to Stir The Pot and see the second form!

To be airdropped on December 1st 2021 to the holders of the Tweetcart Token Club token: hicetnunc objkt #414400

Source Code:

poke(14-😐,1)_set_fps(60)r=rnd
fillp(r({▥,█,▤}))
g=r(5)-3a=r(5)-3b=a/3z=r({2,3,4})w=r({1,3})c=r(14)+2
while(g+a)%b==g do a=r(5)end
for i=0,15do pal(i,r(33)-17,1)end
cls()::_::
if(stat(34)==1or n)g=(g+a)%b n=1
for x=g,128,z do for y=g,128,w do
circ(x,y,r(2),x*y%c)end end
